scripts.dev: concurrently "gnome-terminal --tab -- ngrok http 8080" "wrangler dev" "sleep 5 && npm run updateWebhook"
scripts.updateWebhook: curl -s http://localhost:4040/api/tunnels/ | jq -r '.tunnels[0].public_url' | xargs -I {} sh -c 'BOT_TOKEN=$(cat ./.dev.vars | grep -o 'BOT_TOKEN=[^[:space:]]*' | cut -d '=' -f 2); curl -X GET https://api.telegram.org/bot${BOT_TOKEN}/setWebhook?url={}/api/telegram/webhook'
